channel.title: Project System Going Down
channel.description:
[center]I am In the minst of making a source and client that I will eventually post up on here Its callled [size=18pt][b]Project System GoingDown[/b][/size]
Here are a few pics of what its gonna look like.... Npc's talk with no errors [img]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/convo-1.PNG[/img] Quest show statues of three stages Not Started Incomplete But Started and Finished [img]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/quest-1.PNG[/img] And enhanced dialogues including player in my case Admin77 decent speaking script :3 [img]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/enchanceddialogue-1.PNG[/img][/center] [right]I'll be making a folder that contains all the tutorials I used to learn off inclludding Java.pdf[/right] [left]I give credit to whomever created Project Insanity[/left]

item.title: Project System Going Down
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Good luck with the development, would recommend to clean the development thread up and straighten the wording out a little to make it look a little more appealing to viewers.

Read full topic
